original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅgham uddissa vihāraḥ kārāpitaḥ hoti

original: So tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṁ dātukāmo hoti.
analyzed: saḥ tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatas saṅghassa akāla cīvaram dātu kāmaḥ hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṁ atthataṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena ubhato saṅghassa kathinam atthatam hoti

original: Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṁ yāci.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ upāsakaḥ saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā kathin uddhāram yāci

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
evam ca pana bhikkhave kathinam uddharitabba

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho kathinaṁ uddhareyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ kathinam uddhareyya

original: Yassāyasmato khamati kathinassa uddhāro, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati kathinassa uddhāraḥ saḥ tuṇhassa

original: Ubbhataṁ saṅghena kathinaṁ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: ubbhatam saṅghena khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho so upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṁ yāci.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ upāsakaḥ bhikkhuni saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā kathin uddhāram yāci
cīvaram amhākam bhavissati iti kathin uddhāram paṭibāhi

original: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ upāsakaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ na dassantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ amhākam kathin uddhāram na dassanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikam kathinuddhāram paṭibāhissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikam kathinuddhāram paṭibāhati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikam kathin uddhāram paṭibāhissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikam kathinuddhāram paṭibāheyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: “kathaṁ idaṁ kathinaṁ na uddhareyyā”ti paṭibāhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: katham idam kathinam na uddhareyya ati paṭibāhati āpatti pācittiyassa
dhammike dhammika saññā paṭibāhati āpatti pācittiyassa
